languages.text: "Хаос ступает тихо, {name}. Главная опасность тайных культов и сект — в том, что они, как семена, могут лежать в земле, скрытые даже от пытливого взгляда, долгие десятилетия — пока не появится возможность прорасти и дать чудовищные плоды. Зарождение культа на одной из планет Вольного Торговца не означает, что глава династии сам{mf||а} является хаосопоклонником. Хотя Теодора фон Валанциус была известна своей смелой трактовкой свобод, даруемых {g|Encyclopedia:Warrant}Патентом{/g}".

"Chaos treads softly, {name}. The main danger of secret cults and sects is that they are like seeds. They can remain in the ground for decades, safe from all scrutiny — until an opportunity to sprout, grow, and bear monstrous fruit presents itself. The emergence of a cult on one of the Rogue Trader's planets does not mean the dynasty head {mf|himself|herself} is a Chaos worshipper. Having said that, it should be noted that Theodora von Valancius was famous for her loose interpretation of the freedoms granted by the {g|Encyclopedia:Warrant}Warrant{/g}."
languages.original_text: "Хаос ступает тихо, {name}. Главная опасность тайных культов и сект — в том, что они, как семена, могут лежать в земле, скрытые даже от пытливого взгляда, долгие десятилетия — пока не появится возможность прорасти и дать чудовищные плоды. Зарождение культа на одной из планет Вольного Торговца не означает, что глава династии сам{mf||а} является хаосопоклонником. Хотя Теодора фон Валанциус была известна своей смелой трактовкой свобод, даруемых {g|Encyclopedia:Warrant}Патентом{/g}".

traits.locale_text: "Chaos treads softly, {name}. The main danger of secret cults and is that they are like seeds. They can stay in the ground for decades, safe even from a prying and diligent sight — until an opportunity to sprout, grow and bear monstrous fruit presents itself. The emergence of a cult on one of the Rogue Trader's planets does not mean the dynasty head is worshipping Chaos. Having said that, it should be noted that Theodora von Valancius was famous for her loose interpretation of the freedoms granted by the Warrant."

"Chaos treads softly, {name}. The main danger of secret cults and is that they are like seeds. The emergence of a cult on one of the Rogue Trader's planets does not mean the dynasty head is worshipping Chaos. Having said that, it should be noted that Theodora von Valancius was famous for her loose interpretation of the freedoms granted by the Warrant."

The emergence of a cult on one of the Rogue Trader's planets does not mean the dynasty head {mf|himself|herself} is a Chaos worshipper. Having said that, it should be noted that Theodora von Valancius was famous for her loose interpretation of the freedoms granted by the {g|Encyclopedia:Warrant}Warrant{/g}."

languages.text: «El Caos es sutil, {name}. La mayor amenaza de los cultos y las sectas es que son como semillas. Pueden permanecer bajo tierra durante décadas, protegidos contra todo escrutinio, hasta que se presenta la ocasión de brotar, crecer y dar su monstruoso fruto. La presencia de un culto en el planeta de un{mf||a} Comerciante Independiente no significa que {mf|el|la} líder de la dinastía también sea adorador{mf||a} del Caos. Dicho esto, sí debo incidir en que Theodora von Valancius era conocida por su interpretación... flexible de las libertades concedidas por la {g|Encyclopedia:Warrant}Patente{/g}».
languages.original_text: "Chaos treads softly, {name}. The main danger of secret cults and sects is that they are like seeds. They can remain in the ground for decades, safe from all scrutiny — until an opportunity to sprout, grow, and bear monstrous fruit presents itself. The emergence of a cult on one of the Rogue Trader's planets does not mean the dynasty head {mf|himself|herself} is a Chaos worshipper. Having said that, it should be noted that Theodora von Valancius was famous for her loose interpretation of the freedoms granted by the {g|Encyclopedia:Warrant}Warrant{/g}."

Pueden permanecer bajo tierra durante décadas, protegidos contra todo escrutinio, hasta que se presenta la ocasión de brotar, crecer y dar su monstruoso fruto. La presencia de un culto en el planeta de un{mf||a} Comerciante Independiente no significa que {mf|el|la} líder de la dinastía también sea adorador{mf||a} del Caos. Dicho esto, sí debo incidir en que Theodora von Valancius era conocida por su interpretación... flexible de las libertades concedidas por la {g|Encyclopedia:Warrant}Patente{/g}».

languages.text: “混沌无声无息，{name}。秘密教派与邪教主要的危险在于，它们会像种子一样，可以在地里不为人知地呆上几十年，直到有机会发芽、生长，结出畸形的果实。即便是行商浪人的某颗行星上出现了邪教，也并不意味着那个王朝的领袖{mf|本人|本人}崇拜混沌。话虽如此，西奥多拉·冯·瓦兰修斯对{g|Encyclopedia:Warrant}授状{/g}所赋予的自由权限的理解相当宽泛，这一点仍需注意。”
languages.original_text: "Chaos treads softly, {name}. The main danger of secret cults and sects is that they are like seeds. They can remain in the ground for decades, safe from all scrutiny — until an opportunity to sprout, grow, and bear monstrous fruit presents itself. The emergence of a cult on one of the Rogue Trader's planets does not mean the dynasty head {mf|himself|herself} is a Chaos worshipper. Having said that, it should be noted that Theodora von Valancius was famous for her loose interpretation of the freedoms granted by the {g|Encyclopedia:Warrant}Warrant{/g}."

traits.locale_text: “混沌无声无息，{name}。秘密教派与邪教主要的危险在于，它们会像种子一样，可以在地里不为人知地呆上几十年，直到有机会发芽、生长，结出畸形的果实。即便是行商浪人的某颗行星上出现了邪教，也并不意味着那个王朝的领袖{mf|本人|本人}崇拜混沌。话虽如此，西奥多拉·冯·瓦兰修斯对{g|Encyclopedia:Warrant}许可证{/g}所赋予的自由权限的理解相当宽泛，这一点仍需注意。”

languages.text: 「渾沌はそっと近づいてくるんだよ、{name}。秘密結社や隠れ宗教の本当に恐ろしいところは、まるで種みたいなところだ。何十年もの間、誰にも気づかれることなく土の中に眠っていて、時がくれば芽を出し、大きくなって、巨大な果実を実らせる。自由開拓者の惑星のひとつに魔女団が出現したからといって、王朝の長であるあなたが渾沌崇拝者ということじゃない。とはいえ、テオドラ・フォン・ヴァランシウスは{g|Encyclopedia:Warrant}令状{/g}で与えられた自由をおおまかに解釈していて有名だったから、注意しておかないといけないな」
languages.original_text: "Chaos treads softly, {name}. The main danger of secret cults and sects is that they are like seeds. They can remain in the ground for decades, safe from all scrutiny — until an opportunity to sprout, grow, and bear monstrous fruit presents itself. The emergence of a cult on one of the Rogue Trader's planets does not mean the dynasty head {mf|himself|herself} is a Chaos worshipper. Having said that, it should be noted that Theodora von Valancius was famous for her loose interpretation of the freedoms granted by the {g|Encyclopedia:Warrant}Warrant{/g}."

traits.locale_text: 「渾沌はそっと近づいてくるんだよ、{name}。秘密結社や隠れ宗教の本当に恐ろしいところは、まるで種みたいなところだ。何十年もの間、誰にも気づかれることなく土の中に眠っていて、時がくれば芽を出し、大きくなって、巨大な果実を実らせる。自由開拓者の惑星のひとつに魔女団が出現したからといって、王朝の長であるあなたが渾沌崇拝者ということじゃない。とはいえ、テオドラ・フォン・ヴァランシウスは{g|Encyclopedia:Warrant}令状{/g}で与えられた自由をおおまかに解釈していて有名だったから、注意しておかないといけないな」

languages.text: "Das Chaos kommt auf leisen Sohlen, {name}. Das gefährliche an geheimen Kulten und Sekten ist der Umstand, dass wie Samen sind. Sie können unbeschadet über Jahrzehnte im Boden verharren ... bis sich eine Möglichkeit ergibt, zu keimen, zu wachsen und monströse Früchte zu tragen. Die Entstehung eines Kultes auf einem Freihändler-Planeten heißt nicht, dass das Oberhaupt der Dynastie selbst {mf|ein Anhänger|eine Anhängerin} des Chaos ist. Gleichwohl ist anzumerken, dass Theodora von Valancius für ihre recht freie Auslegung der durch den {g|Encyclopedia:Warrant}Handelsbrief{/g} gewährten Freiheiten bekannt war."
languages.original_text: "Chaos treads softly, {name}. The main danger of secret cults and sects is that they are like seeds. They can remain in the ground for decades, safe from all scrutiny — until an opportunity to sprout, grow, and bear monstrous fruit presents itself. The emergence of a cult on one of the Rogue Trader's planets does not mean the dynasty head {mf|himself|herself} is a Chaos worshipper. Having said that, it should be noted that Theodora von Valancius was famous for her loose interpretation of the freedoms granted by the {g|Encyclopedia:Warrant}Warrant{/g}."

traits.locale_text: "Das Chaos kommt auf leisen Sohlen, {name}. Das gefährliche an geheimen Kulten und Sekten ist der Umstand, dass wie Samen sind. Sie können unbeschadet über Jahrzehnte im Boden verharren ... bis sich eine Möglichkeit ergibt, zu keimen, zu wachsen und monströse Früchte zu tragen. Die Entstehung eines Kultes auf einem Freihändler-Planeten heißt nicht, dass das Oberhaupt der Dynastie selbst {mf|ein Anhänger|eine Anhängerin} des Chaos ist. Gleichwohl ist anzumerken, dass Theodora von Valancius für ihre recht freie Auslegung der durch den {g|Encyclopedia:Warrant}Handelsbrief{/g} gewährten Freiheiten bekannt war.

languages.text: « Le Chaos sait se faire discret, {name}. Si les sectes et les cultes secrets sont aussi dangereux, c'est parce qu'ils s'apparentent à des graines. Ils peuvent rester enfouis pendant des décennies à l'abri des regards, jusqu'à ce que l'occasion de se développer et de porter des fruits monstrueux se présente. L'émergence d'un culte sur la planète {mf|d'un libre-marchand|d'une libre-marchande} ne signifie pas que {mf|le|la} chef de la dynastie {mf|lui-même|elle-même} est {mf|un adorateur|une adoratrice} du Chaos. Cela dit, il faut reconnaître que Théodora von Valancius était connue pour son interprétation très personnelle des libertés accordées par la {g|Encyclopedia:Warrant}lettre de marque{/g}. »
languages.original_text: "Chaos treads softly, {name}. The main danger of secret cults and sects is that they are like seeds. They can remain in the ground for decades, safe from all scrutiny — until an opportunity to sprout, grow, and bear monstrous fruit presents itself. The emergence of a cult on one of the Rogue Trader's planets does not mean the dynasty head {mf|himself|herself} is a Chaos worshipper. Having said that, it should be noted that Theodora von Valancius was famous for her loose interpretation of the freedoms granted by the {g|Encyclopedia:Warrant}Warrant{/g}."

traits.locale_text: « Le Chaos sait se faire discret, {name}. Si les sectes et les cultes secrets sont aussi dangereux, c'est parce qu'ils s'apparentent à des graines. Ils peuvent rester enfouis pendant des décennies à l'abri des regards, jusqu'à ce que l'occasion de se développer et de porter des fruits monstrueux se présente. L'émergence d'un culte sur la planète {mf|d'un libre-marchand|d'une libre-marchande} ne signifie pas que {mf|le|la} chef de la dynastie {mf|lui-même|elle-même} est {mf|un adorateur|une adoratrice} du Chaos. Cela dit, il faut reconnaître que Théodora von Valancius était connue pour son interprétation très personnelle des libertés accordées par la {g|Encyclopedia:Warrant}lettre de marque{/g}. »

languages.text: "Kaos kendini hissettirmeden yayılır {name}. Gizli tarikatların ve mezheplerin asıl tehlikesi, tohum gibi olmalarıdır. Onlarca yıl yer altında, incelemelerden uzakta kalabilir; fırsat bulduğunda filizlenir, büyür ve devasa meyveler verebilirler. Hür Tacir'in gezegenlerinin birinde bir tarikatın ortaya çıkması, hanedanlığın başının Kaosçu olduğu anlamına gelmez. Yine de Theodora von Valancius'un, ona {g|Encyclopedia:Warrant}Ruhsatname'yle{/g} tanınan özgürlüğü oldukça esnek bir şekilde yorumladığını not etmem gerek.
languages.original_text: "Chaos treads softly, {name}. The main danger of secret cults and sects is that they are like seeds. They can remain in the ground for decades, safe from all scrutiny — until an opportunity to sprout, grow, and bear monstrous fruit presents itself. The emergence of a cult on one of the Rogue Trader's planets does not mean the dynasty head {mf|himself|herself} is a Chaos worshipper. Having said that, it should be noted that Theodora von Valancius was famous for her loose interpretation of the freedoms granted by the {g|Encyclopedia:Warrant}Warrant{/g}."

traits.locale_text: "Kaos kendini hissettirmeden yayılır {name}. Gizli tarikatların ve mezheplerin asıl tehlikesi tohum gibi olmalarıdır. Onlarca yıl yer altında, incelemelerden uzakta kalabilir ve fırsat bulduğunda filizlenir, büyür ve devasa meyveler verebilir. Hür Tacir'in gezegenlerinin birinde bir tarikatın ortaya çıkması, hanedanlığın liderinin bir Kaos takipçisi olduğu anlamına gelmez. Yine de Theodora von Valancius'un, ona {g|Encyclopedia:Warrant}Ruhsatname{/g} tarafından tanınan özgürlüğü oldukça esnek bir şekilde yorumladığını not etmem gerek.
